name: Noir Bois: The Prequel Prelude Saga
name_original: Noir Bois: The Prequel Prelude Saga
description: Jay and Stumpy are two bumbling best friends living life in their small hometown of West Point. Suddenly, the pair find themselves solving supernatural issues plaguing their home! Join the duo as they think their way through mind-bending puzzles to overcome their ghostly obstacles in seven episodically released cases. This is a prequel so good, we're releasing it first! Watch out for the first episode in Spring of 2020!  Demo Available Now!
